subject: Football
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Terrell Owens is rarely upstaged, but he was overshadowed on Sunday by the Redskins’ Troy Vincent, a 15th-year defensive back released by the Bills last month.
snippet: Terrell Owens is rarely upstaged, but he was overshadowed on Sunday by the Redskins’ Troy Vincent, a 15th-year defensive back released by the Bills last month.
